About HighwayHomes

Welcome to HighwayHomes, your trusted destination for exceptional RVs. Our goal is straightforward: to make your RV ownership experience smooth and enjoyable from start to finish.

What makes us special?

Great RV Selection

We have a wide variety of premium RVs conveniently located in Munich, Germany. You're sure to find one that suits your travel preferences.

Safe and Clear Payments

Your peace of mind matters to us. We handle your payments securely and transparently through a dedicated trust account.

Quick RV Delivery

We prioritize getting your chosen RV to you fast. It typically arrives within 7-9 days of payment confirmation.

Try Before You Buy

We want you to be completely satisfied. That's why we offer a generous 10 day trial period. Take your time to get to know your RV.

Affordable Delivery

Our delivery rates are budget-friendly, with the first 200 km free and a low 50 cents per km afterward.

Explore the Open Road with Confidence

Discover an extensive selection of top-tier RVs at our prime location in Munich, Germany.
